about_the_game:
Grow your hamster meta farm into an automated hamster coins mining machine, then develop your technologies and gain more technical resources to increase your production and gain even more hamster coins! There is no way down, only way up!

Improve your farm and get your rewards: more hamsters! The more hamsters you have – the faster your farming business grows! And remember: hamsters are more crepuscular than nocturnal and, in the wild, remain underground during the day to avoid being caught by predators but not at your farm. They work 24/7 and they are not scared of anything as hamster coins is the only thing they live for.

Improve your rank, complete the missions, get the rewards, unlock new technologies and mine, mine, mine! You are on the right way, hamster commander!

Please keep in mind that this is just a simulation game and while playing it you don’t mine any real crypto-currency!

Good luck and see you on the Moon!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 and above
  • Processor: Intel i3 Processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD RX 570 or Nvidia GTX 1050 Ti
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Core i5 or better
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX1050 Ti or higher
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
